title: Identify this font
content:
Can anybody, please identify this font? What is its name or to which family of fonts does it belong to?

 [‹ Vintage Font Help](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051258/http:/typophile.com/node/50577 "Go to previous forum topic") [The L Word - ID font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051258/http:/typophile.com/node/50579 "Go to next forum topic")
author: falcon777

comments.content: Off the top of my head, with no research whatsoever, it looks like possibly Bank Gothic or some similar gothic family.

Hasn’t this already been ID’d several times?

[http://typophile.com/node/50531](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051258/http:/typophile.com/node/50531 "http://typophile.com/node/50531")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/50344](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051258/http:/typophile.com/node/50344 "http://typophile.com/node/50344")

Hey! Pay attention. It’s ITC Blair.
